name: Catchin' Flies
description:
In this simple game you control on a frog on a lily pad trying to catch flies!

Since this is my first game jam I wanted to make something simple and that I could complete in time. I hope you enjoy!

Left arrow / Right arrow to paddle

Down arrow to break

Space to catch flies

Scoring:

Black flies are worth 10 points

Yellow flies are worth 20 points

Green flies are worth 40 points

Red flies are worth 80 points

All scores are multiplied if you manage to catch more than 1 fly in one flick by the number you catch!
